price: Parmi Ses signes: Il vous a créés de terre, - puis, vous voilà des hommes qui se dispersent [dans le monde]-.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَنتُم بَشَرٞ تَنتَشِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi an khalaqakum min turābin thumma idhā antum basharun tantashirūna
